description:
When commitment has no deliverables defined, show interactive timeline tool to break commitment into trackable milestones. Include templates for common deliverable types with suggested due dates.

**Rationale:** Commitments without deliverables are hard to track and often fall through cracks. Structured empty state encourages users to define concrete outcomes immediately, improving accountability and project management.
title: Commitment Deliverables Empty State with Milestone Planner
